venue.address_2: Just off of Boylston St between Charles + Tremont, 1/2 block from Boylston T-stop, its inside 'the alley'
venue.name: The Estate

item.description:
BPO proudly presents Boston's biggest Halloween Party at the Estate on October 28th. Come dance to the Intl top 40/ Hip Hop/ House & Bollywood remixes along with some of the greatest Indipop of all time from DJ Farhan!

Give yourself a chance to win drink tickets and many other surprises for best/most creative costumes, so be sure to arrive early. Doors open at 10.30 PM. Winners will be announced at the event.

BPO’s 2010 Halloween party was voted one of the best Halloween Party in Boston and the doors closed at 11 PM. VIP Entry is assured for people who purchase tickets in advance. Please reserve your ticket as space is limited

Tickets URL :http://1bpo.org/2011/...
item.name: Halloween Night : Party From Hell
